p: The World Health Organization has been warned about antibiotics resistance and one of the way to prevent this situation is found new compound with this property (Organização Mundial de Saúde 2018). Thus plants represents important source of new drugs. Ageratum conyzoides L. (Asteraceae) is an annual herbaceous plant very common in the Brazilian northeast with many traditional medicinal and has bioactivity like antimicrobial (Kissmann et al. 1999).
